title: When will riot fix toxic playerbase?
body:
Just wondering if at all.. when will riot actually care about and fix the massively toxic playerbase in A TEAM BASED GAME!! 

its pretty hard to get into league of legends.. especially if your talking about ranked play.. with the current system in place.
Currently riot does not support good sportsman ship and team playing.. only in professional ranked play do you actually have these elements.... pro have solid dedicated players.. they all want to win.. they talk to each other in a real time team enviroment... they have played enough together to work out their personalities so that they can focus on game objectives..the game has serious teamwork flaws in the other area's that are not pro players.. that drags the game down and makes it very difficult for the average player to have a good gaming experience.
There should be some kind of ranking for players in how well they respect the game, their fellow players.. and how competative they are.. So that players are actually matched with similar minded players for better TEAMWORK!!
example you don't want to put 3 "I just want to play the game" players on a team of 2 "I try hard I want to win" type of players and expect a good match outcome.. its not going to happen.. most likely there will be yelling, accusing.. flaming.. some kind of belittlement of a team member because you have 3 players that don't care and are just playing and 2 players that are trying their butts off to win.
I know the reason some of this may be an issue is because doing this would probably alter the average wait time for a match.. which can be another kind of issue for some players... perhaps as a workaround for this.. have a QuickMatch option to match anyone quickly regardless of personality types ie the normal as it is now que option.. or a Teambuilder que where you are matched with similar minded players for a better gaming experience... taking into account that match times will probably be longer.. perhaps to help avoid some frustration maybe have an online counter showing how many are in que atm for this type of match thingy to better help people decide which que mode to enter.
This kind of stuff is constantly happening.. several players have made rant posts about this over the last few years.. and Riot has done nothing that I can see to fix this issue.
Let's be real here.. most players are casual players.. and while the friends system is nice and sorta a way to address this problem.. it doesn't really do it.. as most are casual they might not play enough to see friends on everytime they play.. so being able to match them with similar random people online would be instrumental in this.

I am asking Riot to consider these things.. and how they can address them to improve the game in a POSITIVE way instead of just trying to last another quarter.

You bring up pro play how they communicate properly and focus on winning, let me remind you pro player teams are teams brought together to play with each other all the time, they build relationships with each other, they learn each others strengths and weaknesses and have voice coms. Also they are very good players.. Obvs why they in the pro league. You can't expect your normal games where you play with random people you don't for around 20-40 mins to know to communicate and play like pros. Maybe if league brought voice coms it that could make a difference but at the same time I think players would end up choosing to type then speak because everyone are a bunch of pussy's and act tough over text then in voice.


If anything riot should have little warning symbols next to players names for a certain period of time too let other players know that this player is known to have toxic behaviour. They should force us into report system e.g. keeping the normal stuff like good team work, tilt proof and loved playing with them and an button that would be if the player was being toxic. The only issue that comes with that are people who are dicks that will purposely report players as "rude and toxic" when they weren't, so then they would have to make it so that after 3-4 game the symbol would show up next to the players name. 

At the end of the day I think its too hard for them to create a system that would track toxic behaviour, I've never played a game that had it. You learn to suck it up and realise its a game and move on.
I will not be spending another penny on this game or any Riot game until riot addresses and fixes the massive number of toxic players.. my gaming experience is not worth spending money on to justify.

I'll be honest, its not really their issue to fix society's personalities through this game, if they are actually inting trolling and/or afking, they will eventually get punished, just like criminals do in society. Yes some will slip through the cracks and never be punished, but the majority will. 
They are all like cards, you can't chose them. you just have to deal with it. 
I know it sucks, but its way to hard to police anymore then they already are. It's anecdotally the most popular game out! So its going to be one of the hardest to police with the player base. 
If that is too much to bear, maybe team based games may not be for you. I'v been playing this for ten year and suck at the game, but that doesn't mean I don't enjoy it. I love the competition. Regardless of the above issues.
